input.sentences: we took a tour of the downtown tonight .
after a lot of walking we stopped for food at organization .
it was a neat type of organization | very modern and stylish .
there were lots of seats outside .
we had a good time eating there .
output.sentences: I visited Times Square on a late, cloudy night.
I stopped by McDonald's to get myself a Big Breakfast at 1:00 A.M., because they serve breakfast all day and are open 24 hours.
After I ate, I ventured back into the alley of bright lights and huge advertisements.
In my haste to go shopping, I walked by outdoor tables and chairs for all the hungry tourists who can't get enough of Times Square.
I stopped in a nice bakery and two guys charged me $20 for a plate of cookies because Times Square is in Manhattan and expensive.
